channel.title: CVE Feed for nanosvg library -- nanosvg
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nanosvg library -- nanosvg

item.title: CVE-2019-1010258|2024-08-05T03:07:18.493Z -- nanosvg%20library -- nanosvg
item.description: nanosvg library nanosvg after commit c1f6e209c16b18b46aa9f45d7e619acf42c29726 is affected by: Buffer Overflow. The impact is: Memory corruption leading to at least DoS. More severe impact vectors need more investigation. The component is: it's part of a svg processing library. function nsvg__parseColorRGB in src/nanosvg.h / line 1227. The attack vector is: It depends library usage. If input is passed from the network, then network connectivity is enough. Most likely an attack will require opening a specially crafted .svg file.
